sentences.en: I managed to keep my parents in the dark about this.
sentences.cn: 我设法对父母瞒下了此事。

sentences.en: I was struggling to keep awake.
sentences.cn: 我努力不让自己睡着。

sentences.en: I'll do your garden, I'll keep that tidy for you.
sentences.cn: 我会帮你弄弄花园，帮你保持它的整洁。

sentences.en: If he continues to keep ahead, he will win the race.
sentences.cn: 如果他继续保持领先地位，他将赢得这场比赛。

sentences.en: If you keep your eyes squeezed shut, you'llmiss the show.
sentences.cn: 如果一直紧闭双眼，你就要错过精彩的表演了。

sentences.en: It's a constant struggle to try to keep them up to par.
sentences.cn: 要让他们达标，需要不断努力。

sentences.en: Jay had always tended to keep his girlfriends at a distance.
sentences.cn: 杰伊一贯和他的女朋友们保持距离。

sentences.en: Just play it safe, cover your ass, keep your head down.
sentences.cn: 要谨慎行事，保护好自己并保持低调。

sentences.en: keep down prices; keep the revolutionaries down.
sentences.cn: 控制物价；镇压革命

sentences.en: keep to the original purpose.
sentences.cn: 遵守原定宗旨

sentences.en: Keep your spending on luxuries down to manageable proportions.
sentences.cn: 将你在奢侈品上的花费降至可控范围。

sentences.en: kept up the property.
sentences.cn: 保存财产

sentences.en: Llewelyn was mounting the stairs up into the keep.
sentences.cn: 卢埃林登上台阶，走进城堡主楼。

sentences.en: Locking up men does nothing more than keep them off the streets.
sentences.cn: 把这些人关起来只是做到了不让他们上街而已。

sentences.en: Monstrously inflated prices are designed to keep people like us at bay.
sentences.cn: 疯狂飞涨的价格会使像我们这样的人走投无路。

sentences.en: patients who fail to keep their appointments
sentences.cn: 未能如约来就诊的病人

sentences.en: Relax as much as possible and keep breathing steadily.
sentences.cn: 尽量放松，保持平稳呼吸。

sentences.en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentences.cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentences.en: That's why I must trust you to keep this secret.
sentences.cn: 那就是为什么我必须得相信你会保守这个秘密的原因。

sentences.en: The noise kept him awake.
sentences.cn: 噪音使他一直醒着。

sentences.en: unsuccessfully tried to keep up with his associates.
sentences.cn: 没能赶上他的同事们

sentences.en: We asked her to stop talking, but she kept up.
sentences.cn: 我们请她别再说话了，但她依旧说下去

sentences.en: We huddled around the fire to keep warm.
sentences.cn: 我们挤在火堆边取暖。

sentences.en: We sat round the fire to keep ourselves warm.
sentences.cn: 我们围坐在火边取暖。

sentences.en: When you are sitting, keep your elbow on the arm rest.
sentences.cn: 坐立时，把胳膊肘靠在扶手上。

sentences.en: You can keep it. I don’t need it any more.
sentences.cn: 你留着吧，我不需要了。

sentences.en: You have to work hard to keep ahead in your class.
sentences.cn: 要想在全班保持成绩领先，你就必需努力学习。

words.tran_cn: 监护人；饲养员；看守人；管理人
保持；维持；保管（keep的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 与……并驾齐驱；了解……的最新情况
v. 照看；留意；密切注视
坚持做…：继续某项工作或行为
压制，镇压：阻止…成长、完成或成功
隐瞒，隐藏；抑制；继续燃烧
不落后，赶得上：赶上对手、同事或邻居，指在成就或生活方式上
与人攀比（试图与朋友或邻居保持同样的社会地位和物质水平）

phrases.phrase: you can't keep a good man (或 woman) down
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)有能力的人是不会被挫折或问题吓倒

trans.tran_en: the cost of providing food and a home for someone
to stay in a particular state, condition, or position, or to make someone or something do this

trans.tran_cn: 保持，继续，不退还，保留，保守，存放，遵守，记下，供养，饲养，保护，开设，使耽误，保持不坏，保持健康，守门
trans.tran_en: to stay in a particular state, condition, or position, or to make someone or something do this
